filehandling.sac

インタフェース SACHeaderData

  • 既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    SACData

    public interface SACHeaderData
    Interface of SAC data
    導入されたバージョン:
    2015/09/12
    バージョン:
    0.0.1
    作成者:
    kensuke

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getBoolean

        boolean getBoolean(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum)
        論理値を返す。 数値が整数、文字列のときはエラー
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a boolean value
        戻り値:
        true or false
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of a boolean value

      • getEventLocation

        default Location getEventLocation()
        戻り値:
        Location of the source made from EVLA, EVLO and EVDP. Earth radius is considered as 6371.

      • getEventTime

        default java.time.LocalDateTime getEventTime()
        戻り値:
        date and time of CMT.

      • getStation

        default Station getStation()
        戻り値:
        Station of this header.

      • getInt

        int getInt(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum)
        Returns an integer value
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to an integer value
        戻り値:
        an integer value to the input SACHeaderEnum
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of an integer value

      • getSACEnumerated

        int getSACEnumerated(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum)
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a Enumerated value
        戻り値:
        a enumerated value to the input SACHeaderEnum
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of an Emumerated value

      • getSACString

        java.lang.String getSACString(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum)
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a String value
        戻り値:
        a String value to the input SACHeaderEnum

      • getValue

        double getValue(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum)
        Returns a double value.
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a float value
        戻り値:
        a double value of a float value to the input SACHeaderEnum
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of a float value

      • setBoolean

        SACHeaderData setBoolean(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum,
                         boolean bool)
        Set a boolean value
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a boolean value
        bool - to be set
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the bool
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of a boolean value of is a special boolean.

      • setEventLocation

        default SACHeaderData setEventLocation(Location eventLocation)
        Changes EVDP EVLO EVLA
        パラメータ:
        eventLocation - Location to be set to EVLA, EVLO and EVDP. Earth radius is considered as 6371.
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the location

      • setEventTime

        default SACHeaderData setEventTime(java.time.LocalDateTime eventDateTime)
        Set(Change) event time and date
        パラメータ:
        eventDateTime - to set in SacHeader
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the time

      • setInt

        SACHeaderData setInt(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum,
                     int value)
        整数値を代入する not enumerized TODO debug
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to an integer value
        value - an integer value to be set
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the value

      • setSACEnumerated

        SACHeaderData setSACEnumerated(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum,
                               int value)
        Enumeratedフィールドの代入 今は整数値で受け取る
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to an Enumerated field
        value - a integer value to input
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the value
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of an enumarated value

      • setSACString

        SACHeaderData setSACString(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum,
                           java.lang.String string)
        Set a String value
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a String value
        string - to be set
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the string
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input SACHeaderEnum is not of a String value, if the input string has a invalid length.

      • setStation

        default SACHeaderData setStation(Station station)
        Changes KSTNM, KNETWK(if exists), STLA, STLO
        パラメータ:
        station - to be set
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the station

      • setTimeMarker

        default SACHeaderData setTimeMarker(SACHeaderEnum marker,
                                    double time)
        マーカーに時間を設定する ぴっちりdelta * n の時刻に少し修正する round(time/delta)*delta Set a time marker. Input time will be changed as the new one is on the SAC file If a SAC file has values of time = 0.05, 0.10, 0.15 and the input time is 0.09, then a marker will be set on 0.10(closest).
        パラメータ:
        marker - must be Tn n=[0-9], A
        time - to set in this
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with a time marker.
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if marker is not Tn

      • setValue

        SACHeaderData setValue(SACHeaderEnum sacHeaderEnum,
                       double value)
        Set a double value. Note that a SAC file just holds values as Float not Double
        パラメータ:
        sacHeaderEnum - a key to a float value
        value - a double value to be set
        戻り値:
        SACHeaderData with the value
